system.description:
At 7th level, the power which allows you to guide the elements also allows you to guide yourself. When you make a skill check, you may spend 1 spell point to use your spellcasting ability for the check in place of the ability the skill normally uses. 

Likewise, when you make a saving throw, you may spend your reaction and 2 spell points to add your spellcasting ability modifier to the saving throw (even if your spellcasting ability modifier is already included).

You may only use spell points granted by the Elementalist class when using this ability.
